Person.Organization: BRIGHAM AND WOMEN'S HOSPITALHARVARD SCHOOL OF PUBLIC HEALTH

Policy.acknowledgement_statement: This dataset was generated by the DRIVE GAME-ON consortium (http://epi.grants.cancer.gov/gameon/) (U19 CA148065). The whole-genome sequencing data was provided from the University of Cambridge, UK, Harvard School of Public Health, University of Southern California and Vanderbilt University. The key investigators included Douglas Easton (University of Cambridge, Cambridge, UK), Christopher A. Haiman (University of Southern California, Los Angeles, CA, USA), David J Hunter (Harvard University, Boston, MA), and Wei Zheng (Vanderbilt University, Nashville, TN, USA). We would like to thank the participants and staff of the NHS and NHSII for their valuable contributions as well as the following state cancer registries for their help: AL, AZ, AR, CA, CO, CT, DE, FL, GA, ID, IL, IN, IA, KY, LA, ME, MD, MA, MI, NE, NH, NJ, NY, NC, ND, OH, OK, OR, PA, RI, SC, TN, TX, VA, WA, WY.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution did not respond within six months)

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Cancer, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CA-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Cancer. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
General methods development research is NOT allowed.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use
ConsentGroup.name: GRU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast Diseases, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BRD-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Breast Diseases. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Breast Diseases)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-BRD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction:
Use of the data must be related to Breast Diseases.
General methods development research is NOT permitted.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Colorectal, ovarian, and/or breast cancer, NPU, MDS)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-COBC-NPU-MDS
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Colorectal, ovarian, and/or breast cancer. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations. Use of the data includes methods development research (e.g., development of software or algorithms).

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (PUB, NPU)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-PUB-NPU
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community. Use of the data is limited to not-for-profit organizations.
